testcase.classname: Purchasing the product on the AutomationTestStore application
testcase.name: Registring the application by providing the valid details and then purchasing the product
testcase.system-out: Given Launch the requested browser with the url.............................passed When user clicks on Login or Register link..................................passed And user click on Continue button to fill the required details..............passed When user fill the required details on create account page..................passed And user clicks on Continue button to register..............................passed Then verify whether the correct user name displayed on landing page.........passed And user add the product to the cart........................................passed When user moves to the checkout page for payments...........................passed Then validate the product on payments page showing correctly................passed
